rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
营养和端粒动态如何塑造女性的美丽和衰老研究探索了女性健康、美丽和衰老之间的复杂关系，强调端粒动态和营养在促进长寿和活力方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/How-nutrition-and-telomere-dynamics-shape-beauty-and-aging-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/How-nutrition-and-telomere-dynamics-shape-beauty-and-aging-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b2042e3-f297-43b5-85ef-7f07db0833d9 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 00:14:00 -0400 How nutrition and telomere dynamics shape beauty and aging in women
突破性的代谢组衰老评分比传统方法更好地预测死亡率研究人员使用核磁共振生物标志物开发了代谢组学衰老评分，与其他衰老指标相比，该评分可以更准确地预测短期死亡率和疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Breakthrough-metabolomic-aging-score-that-predicts-mortality-better-than-traditional-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Breakthrough-metabolomic-aging-score-that-predicts-mortality-better-than-traditional-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc72fb58-5b11-460f-a9d0-bba8f7d22049 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 23:46:00 -0400 Breakthrough metabolomic aging score that predicts mortality better than traditional methods
细胞再生图谱揭示了再生策略的主要调节因子2024 年 9 月 9 日，一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 17 期的封面上，题为： “细胞再生图谱：利用网络生物学来识别再生策略的主要调节因子。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Cell-rejuvenation-atlas-unveils-master-regulators-of-rejuvenation-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Cell-rejuvenation-atlas-unveils-master-regulators-of-rejuvenation-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c526bdda-cb59-4690-9bf2-7b424d6bcfdb Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:56:30 -0400 Cell rejuvenation atlas unveils master regulators of rejuvenation strategies
早期粮食不安全与儿童肥胖风险较高有关一项新的研究表明，在幼儿期面临粮食不安全的儿童，或者其母亲在怀孕期间经历过这种情况的儿童，其体重指数 (BMI) 较高，并且在儿童期和青少年期患肥胖或严重肥胖的几率增加 50% 以上。该研究由 NIH 环境对儿童健康结果的影响 (ECHO) 计划资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Early-food-insecurity-linked-to-higher-obesity-risk-in-childhood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Early-food-insecurity-linked-to-higher-obesity-risk-in-childhood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5df4e7a6-b3bf-4dbb-a7fe-68465a83bd10 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:53:00 -0400 Early food insecurity linked to higher obesity risk in childhood
研究发现免疫疗法对具有某些 DNA 错误的前列腺癌有效新的研究表明，免疫疗法可以有效治疗根据肿瘤遗传特征选择的男性前列腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-finds-immunotherapy- effective-for-prostate-cancer-with-certain-DNA-errors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-finds-immunotherapy- effective-for-prostate-cancer-with-certain-DNA-errors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4c0e3b9-7fdd-457e-98fb-fa76c0aad577 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:49:00 -0400 Study finds immunotherapy effective for prostate cancer with certain DNA errors
单克隆抗体可以帮助解决抗菌素耐药性问题科学家表示，单克隆抗体——通过克隆产生抗体的细胞开发的治疗方法——可以帮助解决日益严重的抗菌素耐药性问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Monoclonal-antibodies-could-help-provide-an-answer-to-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Monoclonal-antibodies-could-help-provide-an-answer-to-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b549a1f9-9601-490b-b9eb-d429cabd4e89 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:43:23 -0400 Monoclonal antibodies could help provide an answer to antimicrobial resistance
研究强调抗抑郁药治疗老年人疼痛的证据有限悉尼大学的研究发现，根据使用有限证据的国际指南，65 岁以上的人正在服用抗抑郁药作为疼痛治疗药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-highlights-limited-evidence-for-antidepressants-in-treating-pain-in-older-adults-Univer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-highlights-limited-evidence-for-antidepressants-in-treating-pain-in-older-adults-Univer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fe17ac1-c25c-4025-b1bf-545fb13b5867 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:38:00 -0400 Study highlights limited evidence for antidepressants in treating pain in older adults
解决接受低风险癌症主动监测的患者的焦虑问题接受主动监测的低风险癌症患者面临着良好的长期预后。 David Haggstrom 医学博士、马萨诸塞州医学博士认为，现在是医疗领域帮助管理因等待而引起的焦虑的时候了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Addressing-anxiety-in-病人-undergoing-active-surveillance-for-low-risk-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Addressing-anxiety-in-病人-undergoing-active-surveillance-for-low-risk-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb3433ea-0b8e-4b53-9ccf-fa8a92c1a5ad Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:29:00 -0400 Addressing anxiety in patients undergoing active surveillance for low-risk cancers
海鸟的偷食行为可能会促进致命禽流感的传播自 2021 年以来，致命的 H5N1 禽流感病毒已导致全球数百万只鸟类死亡，并且在极少数情况下可以传播给人类，该病毒可能通过一些海鸟的偷食行为传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Seabirds-food-stealing-behavior-may-facilitate-spread-of-deadly-avian-flu.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Seabirds-food-stealing-behavior-may-facilitate-spread-of-deadly-avian-flu.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3edb9ca3-d471-47a8-bbf3-f3487f9e5f78 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:22:35 -0400 Seabirds' food-stealing behavior may facilitate spread of deadly avian flu
研究表明青少年轻度创伤性脑损伤后抑郁症并未增加根据美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 的数据，2021 年约有 214,110 例创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 和超过 69,000 例与 TBI 相关的死亡，了解 TBI 的身心后果对于研究至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-shows-no-increase-in-depression-after-mild-TBI-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-shows-no-increase-in-depression-after-mild-TBI-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39a62e02-849e-4047-ab85-9c1b1b4edac6 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 22:13:38 -0400 Study shows no increase in depression after mild TBI in adolescents
